title.narrative: Performance for Health through Focused Outputs, Results and Management (PerFORM)

description.narrative: The goal of Right to Cares (RtC) Systems Strengthening TA model is a) Improve HIV-related patient outcomes by strengthening health and patient management systems at facility, sub-district and district level through capacity building and support; b) Build capacity of facility, sub-district and district management systems in coordination with provinces to strengthen health systems in support of HIV/TB-related services; and c) Provide support for development and implementation of successful GoSA policies for HIV related interventions.
